Subject: Hot Rod's dream

From: richard f allen <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

As Hot Rod sleep, he is transported to a dream. He has seen the same
thing over again the last few days.
He sees the classic fight, in the year 2005. He sees himself fighting
Galvatron, inside Unicron. He grabs the Matrix from Galvatron, as it
turns him in to Rodimus Prime. Optimus Prime's voice is heard. 
"Arise Rodimus Prime." Rodimus runs at Galvatron, and throughs him
through Unicrons hull. He opens the Matrix, the power begins to destroy
Unicron. He and the Autobots escape.
Now the dream is in slow motion.
Seconds before Unicrons head blows off, what looks like a construction
droid is launched.

Hot Rod wakes. His organic parts are swetting, he is leeking oil.
What does it all meen? Is Unicron rebuilt?
